infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AnatomLabs+ needs camera access to scan food barcodes and nutrition labels for easy food logging.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: AnatomLabs+ uses motion data to count your steps and track physical activity.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: AnatomLabs+ reads your health data to track steps, calories burned, distance walked, and workout activities.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: AnatomLabs+ saves your workout data and activity to Apple Health.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow AnatomLabs+ to access your camera to scan food barcodes.

plugins.motionPermission: Allow AnatomLabs+ to access motion data to track your steps.
